data.message: Please put messages back the way it was!  The new messenger...not cool

replies.message: if u install the app and delete it you can use the regular app to message

Leigh Ann  check this see if it works..

me too, but it sucks I can't get my messages unless I'm on my computer :(
Facebook is not responding as usually

Or all of you can just realize that Messenger requires the permissions for certain things. Plus other apps throughout the internet require the same permissions. The reason messenger needs Photos, is so that you may send pictures to friends through messenger. Personal texts? I don't know of. Videos? Same as sending pictures. You activate it as choice when you send a picture or video by choice. Besides. They don't look through it. Same as microphone. You activate by pressing the record voice on the chat. Hopefully this helped? Or maybe it won't. Either way, I'm just trying to help a few people. ^_^
